     <a href=\"/offer\"><button class=\"element_hover\">All offers</button></a>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"reviews\">\n        <div class=\"wrapper\">\n            <div class=\"r_title\">They speak about us</div>\n            <div class=\"r_contain owl-carousel owl-theme owl-loaded\" id=\"bara\">\n                <!-- <div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_yellow\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text\">\n                            I&#x27;m working with Everad since they were private. Any issues were always resolved, it&#x27;s clear that long-term cooperation and comfortable conditions are in mind. Since the CPA market moved to confirmed orders, their callback rates are highest.\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/otziv-1.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Stanislav Slesaryev</span>\n                            <p>Top arbitration professional</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div> -->\n                \n                \n                \n                \n                \n                \n                \n                \n            <div class=\"owl-stage-outer\"><div class=\"owl-stage\" style=\"transform: translate3d(-690px, 0px, 0px); transition: 0s; width: 4140px;\"><div class=\"owl-item cloned\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_orange\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text\">\n                           Working with this CPA for quite some time, know the founders personally. Guys can be trusted! Approve rates are really higher on many offers, more volume means more payments, they're one of the best in Runet.\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/otziv-2.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Olegcpa</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item cloned\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_pink\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"96afe608-b93c-61ca-7345-9d12cd6c2f6a\">\n                          I know Everad since their start. We successfully cooperate from time to time. Never had any issues with the system. Can note the wide range of unique offers with high approve. Also they provide great opportunities to work with ruble offers and news showcases. I watch their contests too and even got to visit the final Porsche Panamera party, it was cool. No complaints, can recommend.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 264px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/artemiy_sibirskiy.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Artemiy Sibirskiy</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item active\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block active\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_pink\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"265d8832-6325-e88f-a9e1-e9e3147e2f0f\">\n                          I work with Everad since it was founded in 2013, when they were in beta and the CPA was basically just the stats with a single offer - green coffee :) Now the callback is very good. Sometimes approve rates have reached 80%, but that was with search traffic from context ads. Generally mass-media ads generate above 50% approve. <br>Good unique offers, which is always awesome. Can't but mention their top offers, i.e. Intoxic, Stop Activ, Diabenot and Normalife, which have blown the market up once. High approval rates, adequate support and plenty of offers for any kind of traffic types or sources. Took part in Porsche giveaway, arrived slightly behind the top 15. However, still got to visit the final party and liked how it was organized - the food, drinks, model girls and even a comedian star invited :) In future I'd like to see more unique prizes. Everyone's giving away cars these days. Often recommend Everad to people who ask where to start.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 106px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/mozart.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Mozart</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item active\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_orange\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"ee567c80-29df-fdeb-8841-711f93fe0a5e\">\n                          Been working with Everad for almost a year now. Good offers, high rates and payouts. <br>Usual offers have good callback rates, ruble offers - not so much, at least for me. Taking part in the contest. Great prizes, I'm sure they'll do something cool this time too. <br>I don't use the personal news showcase, because I'm not able to use my own tracker then. <br>Recommend this network. <br>And yes - Everad brings about a half of my monthly income.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 214px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/kubancpa.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Kubancpa</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_orange\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"25b50052-6b4d-2729-267c-76d1d474f276\">\n                          Started working with Everad about a year ago. The callback is great comparing to the competition, most noticeably in 2016 and this year. Exclusive upscale offers and proper adaptive landings to them are continuously coming up. Friendly admin tools, campaigns and stats management are done on professional level. No mobile version of admin tools and it takes a long time to load them on 3G. Took part in the previous car giveaway, bringing traffic for current one too, which is from January 10 till June 15. Hope for better luck this time =) <br> Last year's contest was awesome. Looking forward to being invited to the contest finals at this summer's party. I wish there were some new prizes, not just cars, phones, tablets and laptops. Can recommend, brought many people here already :)\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 131px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/sergeyyu.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Sergeyyu</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_yellow\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"283489ac-6253-7080-081a-91bbb6750176\">\n                          I work with Everad from their very beginning, since the closed beta. I consider them the market leader. They have successful exclusive offers. Fast callback and high approval rate. Rarely they do have issues with delayed payouts or server downtime, but those are not critical. <br>Interesting contests. Personally I am among the top 15 this time, as well as the last time. Everad brings about 75% of my monthly income. Gladly recommend.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 228px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/nwinc.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Artem Nwinc</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_pink\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text\">\n                           Callback is actually the best among the product affiliate networks. Tested a few networks with a Goji split once. Everad had 450 roubles per lead, another network offered 550. And yet Everad was more profitable at 450 per lead with their hellish callback rates.\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/otziv-3.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>aldruhn</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_yellow\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default\" data-ps-id=\"ad7161ce-c9c6-f0dc-c581-f04ced189ed9\">\n                          I've been working with Everad for half a year. Statistics, split-test management, pixels are their strong points. I wish there were more new offers and for some abroad presence, but it's ok overall. Took part in the contest, left impressed. Want to win a plane next time. Can recommend.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 0px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/nexi.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Nexi</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_orange\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text\">\n                           Working with this CPA for quite some time, know the founders personally. Guys can be trusted! Approve rates are really higher on many offers, more volume means more payments, they're one of the best in Runet.\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/otziv-2.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Olegcpa</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_pink\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"cc3397fc-5c07-140b-5746-4e3e2e7abc10\">\n                          I know Everad since their start. We successfully cooperate from time to time. Never had any issues with the system. Can note the wide range of unique offers with high approve. Also they provide great opportunities to work with ruble offers and news showcases. I watch their contests too and even got to visit the final Porsche Panamera party, it was cool. No complaints, can recommend.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 264px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/artemiy_sibirskiy.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Artemiy Sibirskiy</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item cloned\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block active\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_pink\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"81e67466-f9ca-5485-4211-5e4dcc04b132\">\n                          I work with Everad since it was founded in 2013, when they were in beta and the CPA was basically just the stats with a single offer - green coffee :) Now the callback is very good. Sometimes approve rates have reached 80%, but that was with search traffic from context ads. Generally mass-media ads generate above 50% approve. <br>Good unique offers, which is always awesome. Can't but mention their top offers, i.e. Intoxic, Stop Activ, Diabenot and Normalife, which have blown the market up once. High approval rates, adequate support and plenty of offers for any kind of traffic types or sources. Took part in Porsche giveaway, arrived slightly behind the top 15. However, still got to visit the final party and liked how it was organized - the food, drinks, model girls and even a comedian star invited :) In future I'd like to see more unique prizes. Everyone's giving away cars these days. Often recommend Everad to people who ask where to start.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0px; width: 0px;\"></div></div><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y-rail\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 291px; right: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-y\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"top: 0px; height: 106px;\"></div></div></div>\n                    </div>\n                    <div class=\"rcbc_person\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_avatar\">\n                            <img src=\"img/new/mozart.png\" alt=\"\">\n                        </div>\n                        <div class=\"rcbcp_name\">\n                            <span>Mozart</span>\n                            <p>Webmaster</p>\n                        </div>\n                    </div>\n                </div></div><div class=\"owl-item cloned\" style=\"width: 335px; margin-right: 10px;\"><div class=\"rc_block\">\n                    <div class=\"rcb_content rb_orange\">\n                        <div class=\"rcbc_text rb_scroll ps-container ps-theme-default ps-active-y\" data-ps-id=\"94566e82-25b5-6171-6981-7d12a0c8c2fe\">\n                          Been working with Everad for almost a year now. Good offers, high rates and payouts. <br>Usual offers have good callback rates, ruble offers - not so much, at least for me. Taking part in the contest. Great prizes, I'm sure they'll do something cool this time too. <br>I don't use the personal news showcase, because I'm not able to use my own tracker then. <br>Recommend this network. <br>And yes - Everad brings about a half of my monthly income.\n                        <div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x-rail\" style=\"left: 0px; bottom: 0px;\"><div class=\"ps-scrollbar-x\" tabindex=\"0\"
